Committee: Tourism, Parks, Arts And Sports Development

Milestones.Committee: Tourism, Parks, Arts And Sports Development

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Prohibits the sale and installation of certain playground equipment and ground covering which contains recycled tires
Summary: Prohibits the sale and installation of certain playground equipment and ground covering which contains recycled tires or any equipment which was made in part or in whole using recycled tires.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Add ยง13.33, Pks & Rec L; amd ยง399-dd, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law and the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the sale and installation of certain playground equipment and ground covering which contains recycled tires or any equipment which was made in part or in whole using recycled tires
